dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
IMMEDIATELY REMOVE THE FOLLOWING
UNAUTHORIZED APPS IN
CONNECTION WITH THE RED HOT CHILI PEPPERS. THESE APPS HAVE NOT BEEN
AUTHORIZED BY WARNER BROS. RECORDS, INC. OR THE RED HOT CHILI PEPPERS AND
MUST BE REMOVED. THEY INCLUDE UNAUTHORIZED USE OF THE NAME AND LIKENESS OF
THE RED HOT CHILI PEPPERS AND THEIR COPYRIGHTED CONTENT, INCLUDING MUSIC,
VIDEO, LOGOS AND IMAGES.
----------------------------------

NOTICE OF INFRINGEMENT AND DECLARATION

TO: Android Market
(submitted at website)

TO: Google Inc.
Attn: The Android Market Team
Intellectual Property Counsel
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
US
Phone: +1-650-623-5439
Fax: +1-650-618-1806
removals@google.com

REGARDING: https://market.android.com

IMMEDIATELY REMOVE THE FOLLOWING UNAUTHORIZED APPS IN
CONNECTION WITH THE RED HOT CHILI PEPPERS:

Red Hot Chili Peppers - DroidTunes.com ($1.99)
